events.name: QualityControlInitiated
events.description: Represents the start of the quality control process for shipments.

events.name: QualityControlCompleted
events.description: Indicates that the quality control process has been finished.

events.name: QualityIssueDetected
events.description: Represents the detection of a quality issue during inspection.

events.name: QualityIssueResolved
events.description: Indicates that a previously reported quality issue has been resolved.

commands.name: InitiateQualityControl
commands.description: Represents the start of the quality control process for shipments.

commands.name: CompleteQualityControl
commands.description: Indicates that the quality control process has been finished.

commands.name: ReportQualityIssue
commands.description: Represents the detection of a quality issue during inspection.

commands.name: ResolveQualityIssue
commands.description: Indicates that a previously reported quality issue has been resolved.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration with Inventory Management to update stock levels based on quality control results.

integrationPoints.name: ShippingDepartment
integrationPoints.description: Communication with the Shipping Department to halt shipments if quality issues arise.

integrationPoints.name: SupplierManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with Supplier Management to report quality issues back to suppliers for corrective measures.
